"I have no money with me," he said. 
"I'll trust you." 
Rost6v staked five rubles on a card and lost, staked again, and again lost. D61okhov "killed," that is, beat, ten cards of Rost6v's running. 
"Gentlemen," said Dolokhov after he had dealt for some time. "Please place your money on the cards or I may get muddled in the reck- oning." 
One of the players said he hoped he might be trusted.
